title: Scandium
desc:
Post 861
*The first element on this list i know near nothing about. Any element i dont know of will have its effects based off of Wikipedia. Thanks Wikipedia*
- Rub this card on another card, making the card unable to gain any negitive status effects. It also plays 1.5 times when played, rounded down.
- If you manage to rub Scandium on Scandium, you can play the new Scandium card twice, giving a 2 times effect instead of a 1.5.
